Literature.Title: Sustained Release of Antibacterial Lipopeptides from Biodegradable Polymers against Oral Pathogens.
Literature.Author: Eckhard LH, Houri-Haddad Y, Sol A, Zeharia R, Shai Y, Beyth S, Domb AJ, Bachrach G, Beyth N

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Sheep erythrocytes:20% Hemolysis=20 µg/ml,Sheep erythrocytes:40% Hemolysis=50 µg/ml,Sheep erythrocytes:75% Hemolysis=100 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Enterococcus faecalis V583(MIC=4-5µg/ml),Streptococcus mutans ATCC 27351(MIC=6-12.5µg/ml),Fusobacterium nucleatum ATCC 1594(MIC=12.5-25µg/ml),Porphyromonas gingivalis ATCC 33277(MIC=12.5-25µg/ml),Actinomyces naeslundii ATCC 17233(MIC=12.5-25µg/ml)
